ttp_template:
<group name="capabilities_ip_local_interface_neighbor_id">
Interface: {{REMOTE_INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}}/1,  Port ID (outgoing port): FastEthernet0/0
Device ID: {{NEIGHBOR_ID | ORPHRASE}}
  IP address: {{IP | ORPHRASE}}
Platform: {{PLATFORM | ORPHRASE}},  Capabilities: AP 
Interface: {{LOCAL_INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}},  Port ID (outgoing port): FastEthernet0
</group>
cli_content:
Device ID: R1
Entry address(es):
  IP address: 10.1.1.1
Platform: cisco 3725,  Capabilities: Router Switch
Interface: FastEthernet0/1,  Port ID (outgoing port): FastEthernet0/0
Holdtime : 153 sec

Device ID: SW1
Entry address(es):
  IP address: 172.16.1.1
Platform: cisco WS-C3560-24PS,  Capabilities: Switch IGMP 
Interface: GigabitEthernet1/0/1,  Port ID (outgoing port): GigabitEthernet0/1
Holdtime : 120 sec

Device ID: AP1
Entry address(es):
  IP address: 192.168.1.2
Platform: cisco AIR-AP1230,  Capabilities: AP 
Interface: FastEthernet0/2,  Port ID (outgoing port): FastEthernet0
Holdtime : 180 sec
textfsm_template:
Value NEIGHBOR_ID (\S+)
Value IP (\S+)
Value PLATFORM (.*?)
Value CAPABILITIES (.+)
Value LOCAL_INTERFACE (\S+\d+/\d+/\d+|\S+\d+/\d+|\S+\d+)
Value REMOTE_INTERFACE (\S+\d+/\d+/\d+|\S+\d+/\d+|\S+\d+)

Start
  ^Device\sID:\s+${NEIGHBOR_ID}\s*$$
  ^\s+IP\saddress:\s+${IP}\s*$$
  ^Platform:\s+${PLATFORM}\s*,\s+Capabilities:\s+${CAPABILITIES}\s*$$
  ^Interface:\s+${LOCAL_INTERFACE},\s+Port\sID\s\(outgoing\sport\):\s+${REMOTE_INTERFACE}\s*$$
  ^Holdtime \s+:\s+.*
